com.aliyun.odps.mapred
Interface JobContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
TaskContext
public interface JobContext

作业上下文.

JobContext 接口主要定义一些配置参数的获取接口，这些配置参数都是通过 JobConf 设置的

Method Summary
 Class<? extends Reducer> getCombinerClass()
          获取 Combiner Java类
 String[] getGroupingColumns()
          获取Map到Reduce输出的Key的分组列，用于对Key/Value记录按Key进行分组.
 JobConf getJobConf()
          获取作业配置.
 Column[] getMapOutputKeySchema()
          获取Map输出到Reduce的Key类型
 Column[] getMapOutputValueSchema()
          获取Map输出到Reduce的Value类型
 Class<? extends Mapper> getMapperClass()
          获取 Mapper Java类
 int getNumMapTasks()
          获取实际运行的Map数.
 int getNumReduceTasks()
          获取实际运行的Reducer数, 对于Map-only的作业，Reduce个数为0.
 Class<? extends Reducer> getReducerClass()
          获取 Reducer Java类
 

Method Detail

getJobConf

JobConf getJobConf()
获取作业配置. 在 JobConf 设置的配置参数可以从作业配置中读取

注意：这里只能get配置参数，而不能set配置参数

Returns:
作业配置

getNumMapTasks

int getNumMapTasks()
获取实际运行的Map数.

Returns:
实际的Map 数.
See Also:
JobConf.getNumMapTasks()

getNumReduceTasks

int getNumReduceTasks()
获取实际运行的Reducer数, 对于Map-only的作业，Reduce个数为0. 如果通过JobConf.setNumReduceTasks(int)设定过Reducer数，则返回值与其相同； 否则，为Map Task数的1/4.

Returns:
实际的Reducer 数.
See Also:
JobConf.getNumReduceTasks()

getMapOutputKeySchema

Column[] getMapOutputKeySchema()
获取Map输出到Reduce的Key类型

Returns:
Map输出到Reduce的Key类型
See Also:
JobConf.setMapOutputKeySchema(Column[])

getMapOutputValueSchema

Column[] getMapOutputValueSchema()
获取Map输出到Reduce的Value类型

Returns:
Map输出到Reduce的Value类型
See Also:
JobConf.setMapOutputValueSchema(Column[])

getMapperClass

Class<? extends Mapper> getMapperClass()
                                       throws ClassNotFoundException
获取 Mapper Java类

Returns:
Mapper Java类
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException
See Also:
JobConf.setMapperClass(Class)

getCombinerClass

Class<? extends Reducer> getCombinerClass()
                                          throws ClassNotFoundException
获取 Combiner Java类

Returns:
Combiner Java类(Reducer实现)
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException
See Also:
JobConf.setCombinerClass(Class)

getReducerClass

Class<? extends Reducer> getReducerClass()
                                         throws ClassNotFoundException
获取 Reducer Java类

Returns:
Reducer Java类
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException
See Also:
JobConf.setReducerClass(Class)

getGroupingColumns

String[] getGroupingColumns()
获取Map到Reduce输出的Key的分组列，用于对Key/Value记录按Key进行分组. 如果用户没有设置分组列，则默认会使用key的所有列用于分组.

Returns:
分组列
See Also:
JobConf.setOutputGroupingColumns(String[])
